name: Yemenia Airways Aviation Training Center
about: Yemenia Airways Aviation Training Center, located in Yemen, is a premier institution dedicated to providing high-quality aviation training. Established to meet the growing demands of the aviation industry, our center offers a range of programs including Private Pilot License (PPL), Commercial Pilot License (CPL), Instrument Rating (IR), and Multi Engine Rating (MER). Our instructors are experienced airline pilots committed to high training standards. The training is conducted at Mukalla International Airport, known for its excellent weather and modern facilities. We provide state-of-the-art flight simulators, spacious lecture rooms, and comfortable student accommodations. Our focus is on safety, quality, and ensuring students receive the best training to launch their careers as professional pilots. With a strong emphasis on practical and theoretical knowledge, we prepare our graduates for successful careers in the aviation industry.
services:
["Sales Programs 1 Course
Aviation Safety Training 3 Courses
Aviation Security Training 7 Courses
Quality Assurance Training 2 Courses
Airport Handling Training 7 Courses
Air Cargo Training 6 Courses
Dangerous Goods Regulation Training 10 Courses

Course"]
